entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37400

Closed

  • PublishAot "cannot execute: required file not found" on linux-x64 #37295
  • Native AOT produces useless `native` directory in build output #34619
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix stage 2 VMR source-build #37407
    source-build, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • init tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check dependencies of Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver against baseline #37381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37386
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
